website_summaries.verdict: Large enough to house a variety of fish, this 20-gallon aquarium kit includes almost everything you need to get started with your new hobby.
pros: Kit includes scratch-resistant glass aquarium, hood with LED lights, Whisper filter and accessories, Tetra Mini UL heater, plastic plant "mat," and four plastic plants
Just add gravel, extra decorations, water conditioner, and your favorite tropical or freshwater fish
cons: Some owners complained the filter didn't work well and was noisy

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I did not have the right stand for my fish tank at the beginning. The stand I had was not meant for fish tank so it did collapse with the entire 20 gallon water in the tank and several fish! Surprisingly this Tetra 20 gallon fish tank did not break! The fish tank even landed on the stones as everything in the tank fell on the floor and flooded my space but no damage to the glass tank! Not even a scratch! I later bought a good stand that was able to hold the 20 gallon tank. I will recommend this product to all!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Shine

customer_reviews.title: Solid Aquarium Kit
customer_reviews.text: Aquarium kit arrived as described with filter, heater, LED hood, decorative plants, and other items. The filter is as quiet as advertised, but not the most powerful (Tip: Use bio sponge filter media pad for mechanical and biological filtration instead of disposable filter cartridges). The heater keeps the tank water at a constant 78 degrees F. The LED lights under the hood are bright and well displaced. The frame hinges that come with the hood are an excellent feature (most aquarium kits lack hinges for the hood); they make opening and closing the hood very convenient. The glass on the tank is very strong, solid and easy to clean. This is a great tank for fresh or salt water aquariums.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Asemota

customer_reviews.title: Nice setup beware of inside scratches bum filter.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tank. Used a divider to create two different environments. For con. After filling it up I noticed several scratches on the inside of the tank. Because I have filled it up and transferred fish I will just keep it running and watch that it does not get worse. Day two. The filter stopped working. Work with this filter for decades and have never likes it in the past. So planned to get a new filter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holden

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW: Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The lid is flimsy and the LED lights stopped working in 6 months. Don't waste your time. These Tetra tanks are much higher quality than the ones typically found at Wallymart, and at seventy bucks it's a steal! This kit comes with plants (several) and a heater, too! Wow.
customer_reviews.author: aaron-the-baron

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: All the parts are horrid! No aerater (I thought the filter would since a 20gal has to add O2 somehow), "Led Hood" just means a plastic lid that leaves a 2.5" gap around the filter system. The heater is not adjustable AT ALL. either on or unplugged. No clue what the cord with switch is for? Perhaps we are missing a major component?
customer_reviews.author: SGM Cottrell, K

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with my purchase ! My pump will not work properly. It is terribly noisy and will not suck water thru. The lid to the filter set up will not fit properly to close. The hood is also flimsy and so lightweight that the top will not close properly without a weight sitting on top of it. I am returning this item and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Aquastone

customer_reviews.title: The HOB filter is awful
customer_reviews.text: Folks just getting into aquariums need to realize that there will be at least another $100 that you'll need to spend in order to make this highly functioning (like you would want it to). There's substrate/gravel, a heater that's actually rated for this sized tank - I've learned to go up a size so for a 20 gallon, I get one rated for a 30, hiding spots, etc. If you're looking for one and haven't researched what all you'll need, you'll want to do that so you won't get surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Spend $150 on a new one? Or buy a “Used - Luke New” for almost $100 less?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this aquarium set as “Used - Like New” for $57, instead of buying a new one for $150. What a great deal! And it WAS LIKE NEW, literally, it looks like it was bought and then returned without opening it. . If they didn’t tell me it was used, i would’ve guessed it was new. i’m so so so happy with this purchase!!! I highly recommend buying this if you can find a “Used - like new” option.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the filter.
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATED*** After the 3 months of having this kit set up and running the filter is fried! It became super loud and it was constantly over heating. I have had to start over with fish and I have purchased a different filter from a different brand. I am very pleased with this kit. Easy set up and good quality plants. Was definitely more then I was expecting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Naillon

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is my first aquarium. I was shopping on-line and decided to get this set-up (20 gallon). I went to the fish store around my house and noticed the price I paid on Amazon I would buy a much larger aquarium with standing. I wish I could return but I already added lots of decor and fish. Thermometer is cheap. Before buying try to search all your options.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Danny2019

customer_reviews.title: Happy but not happy with the snap off in the back
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m happy with this tank. I was annoyed that you have to “snap” off the back part to insert the pump. When I did this, the other side snapped off too. Now I have a huge gap at the back of my tank with no cover on it. I might just call and see if I can get another top...I have a cat that might try to get in there!
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great tank, good heater, good filter, led light's work well but no adjustability, it's on/off. I use mine to hold/breed feeder fish so I doubled the filters but, as is, it will work great stocked properly. Tetra has been doing these tank kits forever, you get what what you pay for and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing company to deal with. The first one arrived with a pane of glass broken. I cringed because I use Amazon for convenience and having to deal with the hassle of a return is anything but convenient for me. However, they made it as easy, fast, and painless as humanly possible. The second one arrived in perfect condition and is exactly what I needed for my project. You rarely see companies truly put customer service above all else these days. So, this was a surprising and wonderful experience. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My fish were living in a run down, sub-standard rental unit. Now? Now they're living in the lap of luxury. Seriously! I'm pretty sure I saw them smile. Well made. Easy to assemble. Love the L.E.D. lights. So pretty. The plastic plants come with the kit. Gravel is purchased separate.
customer_reviews.author: Upnorthchick

customer_reviews.title: Terrific starter aquarium!
customer_reviews.text: We love this fish tank. It came quickly and has most everything you need to get started. It came with AquaSafe but no SafeStart so had to go out and buy that extra. That's the reason I marked down one star. Followed set up directions that came with tank and everything is great. The plants look terrific too! Very life like. Our fish are so happy and playful in the new tank. We'll buy this set again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Overall, an excellent starter aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. I've had aquariums before, which I had to get rid of for long-distance moves. This is a great way to get started for someone who hasn't owned one before. Fairly easy to set up, but the instructions for the filter and lights could be clearer. The kit does NOT come with gravel. My only complaint, really, is that I would have preferred an under-gravel filtration system, instead of the one supplied. I wound up buying one, so now I have both systems.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  W Willis

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea
customer_reviews.text: It sounds like a good deal until you have to replace all the extras. Heater went out after a month, had to replace the filter because the one included isn’t really big enough for 20 gallons. Plant were pretty cheap. Much better to buy each piece separately.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good tank, accessories not so much
customer_reviews.text: Filter is finicky - the intake tube cannot be pushed all the way in or the motor will not function. I received neon plants for a glo-fish style set-up. Not what I expected nor will I be using them since I prefer the more natural look . Otherwise tank and hood are fine.
customer_reviews.author: bambiker

customer_reviews.title: he price was good for the item
customer_reviews.text: It turns out the tank is the same tank I had purchased 30+ years ago, only the included items were newer. The tank was in excellent shape and went together fine. I recommend this tank to anyone who wants to start a fish tank.
customer_reviews.author: J. Prievo

customer_reviews.title: Bad filtration
customer_reviews.text: Change the filter name from whisper to scream, also the biobags provided by tetra are useless. Get a different brand biobag or better yet a different filter. PS. I have 4 aquarium only 1 has this issue (the rest are other brands)
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad hussein haidar

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Shouldn’t be called a whisper filter. I guess I’ll get used to the loud noise but I’m going to shop around for something better. The tank and everything that came with it is great....except the NOISE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tank
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old son and he loves it! It’s working out great and his fish are thriving. I love the light and it looks great in his room!
customer_reviews.author: J. Goggins

customer_reviews.title: Happy fish
customer_reviews.text: This tank was just the right size for what I needed. It came with everything needed so I didn't need to buy anything extra (except the fish of course). It is well lighted and I love the neon decorations.
customer_reviews.author: E.Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Fish are happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you my fish are super happy now thank you so much.every thing you see here from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Mr Turtle loves his new home
customer_reviews.text: We needed a bigger tank for my daughter’s Baby Eastern Painted Turtle. We brought this tank purchased a screen cover and different filter. This was perfect and even tough we purchased a few things separately this was still the most cost effective option. Love this tank.
customer_reviews.author: SheLuvsGodTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the new home for my fish. I changed them out and unfortunately all my little babies didn't make it, but the tank will make a beautiful home for the new ones I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: iamDeonQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank, but has several scratches, which I noticed too late
customer_reviews.text: This kit is nice, however after I put it together, added water, moved the fish back, when I turned the LED lights on I noticed that the tank has several scratches. Bummer. Too late to do anything now.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Torres

customer_reviews.title: scratched up glass, fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: There are scratches on the glass which made me concerned about filling the tank but so far no issues. Its weird thought the scratched are on the front and back glass in the same spot. The person who put the unit together, had silicone on his hand then left fingerprints and a palm print on the glass. Good enough to get a latent print, ridges and all.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A.

customer_reviews.title: Good/ broken
customer_reviews.text: The tank setup was easy and straight forward. Clean the tank and plants without soap. You'll need a stand to hold it. It doesn't come with rocks so you'll have to get those. Make sure to wash them before putting them in the tank and adding water. Mine didn't come with the thermometer and had a broken clip for the top but I called tech support and apparently they're on their way
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, no leak aquarium
customer_reviews.text: We have it for over 2 months and no issues so far. Very good starter kit for beginners who have enough space.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great aquarium kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great aquarium and it was easy to assemble! The Whisper filter works really well! I’m really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea and Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner tank!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's birthday. He's become an addict in the space of a month. We now spend weekends at the pet store, and he's on a first name basis with the employees there. It's as if he has adopted children, and has a close relationship with their caregivers. Not only that, but he's become a horticulturalist specializing in aquarium plants. I thought I'd give him something pretty to sit and look at; but, man, this has him socializing, learning, reading, and nurturing in a way that his biological children never inspired him to do. In short, what do you buy a fisherman who lives in a lake-less area? One of these aquarium sets!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: REALLY AMAZON?!
customer_reviews.text: I finally received my tank after over a month of waiting. This time the tank isn't broken. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Great starter Aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was good. All products included work and are quality. No leaks and very durable
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Dead fish...
customer_reviews.text: Tank itself is great, the fake plants are okay. The filter sucks though. I think the bio cartridge was defective. All my fish died while I was out today!
customer_reviews.author: Kurokaminova

customer_reviews.title: Not for live plants
customer_reviews.text: This unit is quiet and beautiful but it cannot sustain a planted aquarium since it lacks the proper wavelengths to do so. Only buy if you want fake plants.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Great price & quality for 20 gallon!
customer_reviews.text: As described, came early! Packed carefully, no chips or cracks, all items packed neatly inside with directions.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepyhollow

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old Granddaughter. Per her request. Tetra is a known and trusted brand. Wouldn't buy anything but the best for my Granddaughter. She loves it and its of the highest quality
customer_reviews.author: love to read

customer_reviews.title: Great Tank
customer_reviews.text: Great tank I would buy it again very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: vyeates409

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tank
customer_reviews.text: Great set up, comes with everything except fish, gravel and water. Make sure you follow instruction and wait before adding fish.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Santos

customer_reviews.title: Lighting , heater were good Whisper filter ok for the price I prefer aqueon filter
customer_reviews.text: Nice Tank all good. Artificial plants are of cheap quality but all n all it was a good buy Service with prime was overnight and that helped as I had leaky tank to replace
customer_reviews.author: DAVID ROMAGNOLI

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: Glass is cracked. About 3-4 inch crack at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brumley

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: I definitely suggest an undergravel filter and a much stronger heater for this tank. The heater provided is not strong enough for this size tank. I've been running the tank for about 5 months now and have had no issues. Currently keeping 3 cory catfish, 2 bloodfin tetras. 2 swordtails and a bushy nose pleco. They all seem happy with their environment.
customer_reviews.author: AdamOz

customer_reviews.title: Pump is undersized for the tank
customer_reviews.text: Tank and cover are nice. The plants are a nice touch. Unfortunately the filter is undersized. The intake tube is only a few inches long and way too high off the bottom. Ours lasted two weeks and then it stopped filtering the water.
customer_reviews.author: zero4two

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble. Broke one of the hinge tabs...directions are a bit cryptic. Also, didn't come with digital thermometer, but I had one anyway and it was a Warehouse deal, so maybe it was missing when returned.
customer_reviews.author: ODogg

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great tank i love it comes with everything youll need to get started all youll need is to grab cleaning supplies
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lights
customer_reviews.text: Lights go out on the hoods very poor quality,I bought 5 20 gallon nd one 30 gallon ,and 4 of the 20 gallon lights stopped working
customer_reviews.author: John grubb

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank, nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice tank, nice kit. Fair warning, it comes with a Whisper 20 filter. Which is very short for the tank. I bought ours for turtles and they do not make an extension for the Whisper 20. We did modify the filter with plastic tubing and a connector to allow the filter line to reach the bottom of the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cannot honestly review the product itself only review the way the item looked when it was delivered to my house. It looked like somebody kicked the sides of the Box in and the top was tore open. When I opened the box rest of the way it appears that the glass is okay I won't know until my granddaughter opens it at Christmas time and fills it with water.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Pump lasted one day
customer_reviews.text: Set up aquarium yesterday. Let it stabilize all day and added fish last night. Everything was great until today and filter pump quit working. Double checked power. Pump defective
customer_reviews.author: edward Eastup

customer_reviews.title: Wait a week between adding fish 2 at a time. Add bacteria cap full each week
customer_reviews.text: The package was marked fragile or handle with care on all sides and it was packaged very well. The aquarium and parts arrived with no broken parts. The instructions were easy to follow for a beginner and with a little help from our local pet store we had it set up and started adding fish in a few days. It's always good to let your tank cycle. If I had it to do over again I would have waited 30 days before adding fish.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: So awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank. And so do my fish that were previously in a 10 gallon tank...
customer_reviews.author: Erik S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s everything you’ll need
customer_reviews.text: Love the tank! So do my angels! It was everything I needed right down to the net!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Tinkham

customer_reviews.title: Great tank!😃
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t got any fist yet but the tank is beautiful! Perfect size! Filter made some noise at first like some of the reviewers said but once I “primed it” (first time I even heard of that phrase lol) and added water to the actual tank the noise was gone! All that remains is a peaceful waterfall sound. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Plangji Dakum

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tank
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 8 yr old grandson and he loves it and takes responsibility for the care of the fish and upkeep of the tank. He gets many hours of enjoyment watching his fish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe in came in unbroken!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need for an instant aquarium. Love it! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ron brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great price and awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product at an unbelievable price. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase. There is no possible way that any customer wouldn’t be extremely happy with this aquarium kit
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Loud filter- decent starter kit
customer_reviews.text: While this is a great starter aquarium kit, the "whisper" filter is unbearably loud. No amount of fussing or adjusting has helped. I've had aquariums most of my life and have never heard anything like this. It very impressive noise from such a small filter. If it weren't for the noise, I would have given it 5 stars. The tank is great, packaged well and no leaks. Lots of awesome fake plants and everything else you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 20 gallon  Aquarium kit w/filter and acces.
customer_reviews.text: Yes I would recommend. Came packed well. Accessories were plentiful. Too many plants but can change when needed.
customer_reviews.author: D Porrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank
customer_reviews.text: Love this tank. We'll made and so far zero leaks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great set up
customer_reviews.text: everything it comes with makes for a quick easy set up fish and kids love it
customer_reviews.author: tiffney lang nunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i paid for, had a broken piece with the pump but when I called their customer support they were quick to help and she was not a robot and knew what she was talking about, replaced the piece promptly, and over all its was a great experience
customer_reviews.author: Talisa

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: My son won a fish at the fair so I bought this for him. It has everything you need and looks great with the lights on. It's been a few months and the fish is growing into the tank.
customer_reviews.author: kdherald

customer_reviews.title: Medium grade filter in  lid.  The lights and tank  Are good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit. Filter and lid are a little flimsy or cheap . All in all I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Fogle

customer_reviews.title: Change it’s filter often
customer_reviews.text: We love the size of the tank. We only have 1-goldfish but he’s about 6-7 inches long so perfect for his size & he’s very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Great starter aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Great affordable n gas everything to start up. with a great price tag ..also attractive
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good Tank
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tank. I had some trouble figuring out the filter but after reading some more reviews I discovered you have to push down on the Wonder Tube until it clicks into place. Mine is completely quiet and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: and am completely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tank for three months,now, and am completely happy with it. Everything works perfectly. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Macie L. Staples

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the money, but the water filter has slowly gotten louder and louder over the couple of weeks that I've had it. It is now so loud, I can hear it throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Berger

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Prefect for a family room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lighting
customer_reviews.text: I the only thing I don't like is the lighting system. Sometimes it takes 3 or 4 times of turning it on and off before it comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice aquarium. I like the cover and the lights ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice aquarium. I like the cover and the lights that are attached to the underside. Very, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The lid and i dont know what the black rock thing are broken and the led lights are gona along with the back ground gone i did buy it for $77 i guess its ok for a 20 gallon fish tank
customer_reviews.author: Robin west

customer_reviews.title: How do I replace it.
customer_reviews.text: I stated delivery was great but the glass intheaqurium is broken
customer_reviews.author: Diana J. DeAguero

customer_reviews.title: Look at other options
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of cut corners on this product. The glass aquarium itself is fine but the lid and lights feel super cheap and brittle. The filter lasted under a month.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and shipping was on time. The quality of the tank is amazing with no holes, can’t wait to put my fish in!
customer_reviews.author: Nevill

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly a great looking tank
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. Easy assembly a great looking tank.
customer_reviews.author: Simeon

customer_reviews.title: The heater is ok so far but the filter is a piece of garbage. The filter does not keep the water cycling
customer_reviews.text: The tetra aquarium kit is ok. The heater is ok so far but the filter is a piece of garbage. The filter does not keep the water cycling. The filter loses water very 1 minute to 30 seconds and take to long to start again. It does the for the whole time. The kit is ok. But I would not buy it because of the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this aquarium - filter - plants ect ect ect
customer_reviews.text: love this aquarium - filter - plants ect ect ect . I thought it was a good deal, because after pricing all the pieces separately, It would have cost me more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tank.
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome tank. Very easy to set up. Anyone that says otherwise is crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s very nice. Everything I needed came with the tank
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the aquarium. It’s very nice. Everything I needed came with the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Kjames22

customer_reviews.title: Need new lights for hood
customer_reviews.text: The tank is fine but there were too many lights for the hood. How can I get a strand of lights that fit the 20 gallon tank hood?
customer_reviews.author: Julie A DeSena

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted. All of the parts were there and all working.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get what they wrote in the description
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this tank and I didnt get the other stuff it said I will get with the tank disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Perez

customer_reviews.title: ... did not leak and the lighting set up is nice. The filter did not work and I had ...
customer_reviews.text: The tank did not leak and the lighting set up is nice. The filter did not work and I had to go buy another filter since I had this whole tank set up and ready to go I wasn't going to return the whole thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift and with trips to hospital it has not been set up yet so cannot say much yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right side of tank for the Red cap Oranda
customer_reviews.author: custodio gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the filter
customer_reviews.text: I love this tank. Only downfall was the filter quit after a few weeks. I have ordered another hoping the one I received with the tank was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: Price is good and anyone can probably set it up in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H. Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Great starting tank
customer_reviews.text: Nice tank complete with everything needed to start. LEDs are too bright.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Great fish tank
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed all in one box. Quiet filter, I only had trouble with the lid snapping into place
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No PUMP
customer_reviews.text: Yes its stated it's complete it does not have a pump
customer_reviews.author: linda johnson

customer_reviews.title: Filter worked great for about two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Filter worked great for about two weeks, then quit. Tried everything I could think of, then took it up to local pet store and they could not get it to work! Had to buy another one! Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Tank looks great. I wish they wouldn't put things in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Tank looks great. I wish they wouldn't put things in the photo that are not coming with the tank...The description doesn't say the rocks come with the tank but....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: know how to return damage products
customer_reviews.text: fuel pump was damage cant find a way to return
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tank
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great tank. It looks so nice and comes with everything needed except rocks.
customer_reviews.author: rldantoni

customer_reviews.title: Shattered sides inside the box soo disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I sliced and punctured my hand when openin the box inside. BUMMER!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbe Flint

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: First one I got was cracked. You sent another right out and was great. Thank you for quick response
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing stuff
customer_reviews.text: 2 nd. order came complete. Great starter package. Comes with everything, but the fish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. So much easier to maintain than my fluval edge brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley A. Basinger

product_meta.title: Tetra Aquarium 20 Gallon Fish Tank Kit, Includes LED Lighting and Decor
product_meta.description: The Tetra 20 Gallon Aquarium kit is just what you need to dive in to starting a new tank. The Tetra 20 Gallon Kit is perfect for the aquarist looking for a traditional aquarium with natural scenery or someone looking to break into this exciting hobby! A 20 gallon tank is an ideal size to comfortably contain multiple fish while not taking up too much space in your home. The team at Tetra has designed an aquarium kit which takes all the guesswork out of setting up an aquarium. Each of these kits includes a 20 Gallon Glass Aquarium, one LED hood, one Tetra 100 Watt heater, one Tetra Whisper 20 filter, one artificial Boxwood Plant Mat, and 2 artificial plant multipacks to add color and shelter for your fish. Have peace of mind knowing that these Tetra products are built to last. Every aquarium comes with TetreCare experts to guide you through this exciting process.
feature_bullets: Tetra Glass Aquariums are made in the USA and are built to last with scratch resistant glass
The Tetra Aquarium comes loaded with an LED hood, that provides a natural daytime effect and a Whisper Filter that is whisper quiet while providing powerful, dependable water flow
Artificial Plants add a unique, natural ocean feel while giving your fish a place to hide which reduces fish stress

The Tetra Kit includes: one 20 Gallon Glass Aquarium, one LED hood, one Tetra Mini UL Heater, one Tetra Whisper 20 Filter, one artificial Boxwood Plant Mat, four artificial plants. Add gravel and fish to complete your aquarium
Aquarium Dimensions: 24.2" L x 12.4" W x 16.7" H
